attributes.action: Stop allowing anyone claiming full rent benefit for million pound homes
attributes.additional_details:
It is totally unfair when some people can insist  and demand to be housed in homes worth millions and expect the whole rent and council tax to be paid for via benefits, while the rest of us are only allowed a total of £575 per month for rent.
The government MUST set a limit for EVERYONE,no matter where we live in England.
